data.title: Mobility Cairo
data.text:
Website information:

Welcome to the website www.mobilitycairo.com. By using this site, you acknowledge having read this legal notice and you agree to respect it. This legal notice is intended to inform you of the existence of intellectual property rights to be respected. The content of this notice may change; we therefore invite you to consult it regularly.

Realization and development:

Atixnet (SAS) whose registered office is at 2bis Avenue Foch, 94160 SAINT MANDE, registered in the R.C.S. of Créteil under the unique identification number 443 452 503 - NAF code 6202A, represented by Mr Guillaume TOTOT, as Manager.

Publication Director: Wadii BOUCHIHA – CEO / Managing Director

Hosting: RATP DEVELOPPEMENT S.A.E., a joint stock company with management and supervisory boards, incorporated and registered in France with a share capital of €347.300.852,76, listed in the Paris Trade and Companies Register under No. 389 795 006

Head office : 54 quai de la Rapée, 75012 Paris, France.

EU VAT No. FR75389795006.

I. Purpose of the RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. Website.

The site provides information on RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E.

This site is the property of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E.,

Registered office: 23 kasr Elnil street, Cairo, Egypt

EEC VAT number: 579-901-610

Any communication may be made via the contact form in the contact tab of the Site.

II. Protected rights – Intellectual property.

The elements constituting the present Site, developed by RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. and its subsidiaries or on their behalf (hereinafter "the Content"), are protected by the applicable legislation concerning copyright, trademark law, copyright law and designs and unfair competition.

The Content includes, in particular, the architecture, the graphic charter (including the colors, the fonts and the graphic organization of the screens), as well as all the information and elements available on the Internet site, such as in particular the texts, articles, photographs, illustrations, images, brands and logos, data, databases and all sound elements (such as voice, music or sound effects) and fixed or animated visuals (such as graphic animations or audio-visual sequences), software developments specific, downloadable programs.

The Content is the property of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. and its subsidiaries or its technical service providers.

Any reproduction, representation, distribution and / or exploitation of all or part of the Content, by any means, in any form and for any purpose whatsoever, is prohibited without the express prior written consent of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. In any case, and subject to the foregoing, the source (this Site and RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E.) and, if applicable, the name of the author, must be clearly indicated.

Anyone who does not comply with the applicable legal provisions is guilty of the offense of counterfeiting and is liable to the penal sanctions provided for by law, notwithstanding any other remedy of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E.

Photo credits

Audiovisual Agency RATP 54, quai de la Rapée 75599 PARIS CEDEX 12 (Gilles Aligon, Charles Ardaillon, Jean-Marie Carrier, Bertrand Chabrol, Noam Cilirie, Gérard Dumax, Didier Dupuy, Gilbert Gaillard, Didier Jackson, Bruno Marguerite, Jean-François Mauboussin, René Minoli, René Roy, Denis Sutton, Joël Thibault, Eric Touzé)

III. Responsibility

RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo exclude all warranties of any kind with respect to the Content, including any adequacy guarantee for a particular purpose, ownership and non-infringement. In addition, RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. disclaim any liability whatsoever for direct or indirect damages, incidental or incidental, loss of data or profit, resulting from, or related to the use or operation of the present Site and content.

In addition, the Site may contain inaccuracies or typographical errors.

Changes and updates are regularly made to this Site. In this respect, RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. reserve the right to make any modification, rectification or change at any time.

This Site contains links allowing you to leave the Site. These links are provided for your convenience only, and do not imply endorsement or endorsement of such sites by RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. The target sites are not under the control of RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E., and they are in no way responsible for the content of these sites, the links they contain, the products or services they offer, or changes or updates. updated to them.

Trademarks, product names or services, domain names and corporate names mentioned on this Site remain the property of their respective owners.

The mention of links or trademarks, names, services, domain names and names of other companies does not imply the existence of any association between RATP DEVELOPPEMENT Mobility Cairo S.A.E. and these companies, products or services, brands, names or denominations in question.

IV. Protection of privacy – Collection and use of personal data.

The use of our website requires the collection and processing of personal data about you. For more information, we invite you to read our Data Usage Policy on our website.

V. Current law and juridical competence

The site and its contents are governed by the French Law, and any possible litigation relating thereto will be subjected to the competence of the French courts.
